name: AltaricLife
description:
Altaric Life - Survival Game without world generation!

AltaricLife is a survival game that was inspired by terraria and muck (yes that's weird). In this game you appear on an island with an altar that will give you the resources you need to survive. You have only 3 attempts and if you spend all of them then the world will reset and everything will start all over again.

 The game is still in development and this is only alpha.
